Blockcp2 is a home for your copyrights. Claim all your copyrights to protect them and find out who is using them. We also will give you ways to make money with your copyrights!

Get started claiming by dragging images anywhere on this page or clicking the box above.

All copyrights are timestamped on the blockchain. This creates a permanent record that is impossible to alter. Thus, making it the perfect evidence to protect your copyright!

Honor Code

By using Blockcp2, you are agreeing to be honest and follow the creator's code of honor.

What can I copyright?

You can copyright any creative work which you authored.

How is a copyright different from a patent?

A patent protects an idea. A copyright protects the expression of an idea in physical or digital form. So, you can't copyright the idea for a painting, but you can copyright the actual painting.

When do I have my copyright?

You own your copyright from the moment of creation. It's one of the most protected asset types that exists. In the U.S., the government can't take it away from you unless you do a chapter 11 bankruptcy.

Can I protect my copyright without registering with the Government?

Yes. If you have proof of publication, you can protect your copyright. You can send a cease and desist letter or a DMCA notice.

To be rewarded damages in a lawsuit, you need to register with the Copyright Office. If you have proof of publication, you have 5 years to register with the Government.

What is the DMCA?

DMCA stands for the "Digital Millennium Copyright Act". It protects websites like YouTube from being liable for copyright violations. To not be liable, they must respond and take action. All websites must respond to DMCA notices.
